name: Battle FTL
description:
The ultimate space battle.

This is your last battle against the aliens. Good luck, marine.

Easy to learn, hard to master.

Tap/Click on Left and Right side of screen (arrow keys on keyboard) to control the space ship. Score by destroying the aliens, but avoid getting damaged.

Test your endurance. 

See how long you can keep the game going. Put your reflexes to test.
